cq-studio documentation¶

About cq-studio¶

cq-studio is a hot-reloading server for to view CadQuery 3D models interactively while you edit your code.

CadQuery is used to programmatically design models, with Python code.

cq-studio uses the YACV-server viewer, which renders your models in your web browser, with an advanced set of controls and features.

cq-studio allows you to edit your model file(s) and packages or modules which they import, and automatically re-render the models in your browser whenever the changes are saved to disk.
